description:
Create a program that asks the user how they get to school and how many minutes it takes them (using int).
Then print "I can't believe it takes you minutes to get to school by !" For example, if the user inputs "car" and "45", the program should print "I can't believe it takes you 45 minutes to get to school by car!"
correct-program: transportation = input("How do you get to school? ") minutes = int(input("How many minutes does it take you? ")) print(f"I can't believe it takes you {minutes} minutes to get to school by {transportation}!")
